name: Muhammad
role: Religious leader and founder of Islam
what_did:
Muhammad received messages from Allah (God) through the angel Gabriel.
He taught that there is only one God and that people should live justly and kindly.
His words were written down in the Quran, the holy book of Islam.
why_matters:
Muhammad founded Islam, a major world religion followed by over a billion people today.
His teachings shaped the culture, law, and values of many countries.
He is considered the final prophet in Islam.

questions.q: How did Muhammad receive messages from God?

fun_fact: Muhammad could not read or write — but his words were remembered and written by his followers!
